svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-149" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;fontColor=#FF0000;" value="このうちのどれかのLinkでHeaderを設定する" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="285" x="105" y="285" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-150" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="540" width="500" x="85" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-151" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" value="<div style="line-height: 160%;">import { ApolloLink, HttpLink, InMomeryCache } from "@apollo/client";<div><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const link1 = new ApolloLink( ( operation, forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	<b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">operation.setContext( ( prevContext ) =&gt; {</b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	return {</span></b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	...prevContext,</span><br></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	headers: {</span></b></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	header1: "valur1",</span><br></b></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	header2: 2</span><br></b></span></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span>}</span><br></b></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span>};</span><br></b></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"><b><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;">	</span>} );</b></span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre; line-height: 160%;"><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward( operation );</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const lastLink = new HttpLink( {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	uri: "https://mygraphql-server"</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">const client = new ApolloClient( {</div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	link: ApolloLink.from( [</span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	link1.</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	lastLink</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>] ),</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	cache: new InMomeryCache()</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">} );</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="520" width="450" x="110" y="490" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-152" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="クライアント側のLink作成コード" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="215" x="85" y="450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-153" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#0066CC;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="80" width="150" x="180" y="606" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-154" parent="1" {<div><div style=""><span style="white-space: pre; font-size: 12px;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre; font-size: 12px;">&lt;項目名&gt;: &lt;値&gt;</span></div><div>}</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="130" x="410" y="616" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-155" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;" height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="420" y="586" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="470" y="536" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-157" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#009900;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="200" x="100" y="790" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-158" parent="1" style="text;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;labelBackgroundColor=none;align=center;fontColor=#009900;fontStyle=1;verticalAlign=middle;" value="HttpLink側ですることは特に何もない" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="40" width="140" x="390" y="805" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-159" edge="1" parent="1" source="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-158" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#009900;" target="yYMKVWXmJqMKO6bpb7A9-157" value=""> <mxGeometry height="50" relative="1" width="50" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="480" y="650" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="400" y="650" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 350px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 100px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 20px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 303px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 26px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
